description.translate: Will you risk putting on that which will make you as irascible as the King of Ouranos?

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Colère d'Aoran\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Vous risquerez-vous à revêtir ce qui vous rendra aussi\"}","{\"text\":\"§7irascible que le Roi d'Ouranos ?\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Will you risk putting on that which will make you\"}","{\"text\":\"§7as irascible as the King of Ouranos?\"}","{\"text\":\"§7HER§a1 §7DAR§a1 §7STR§c-1\"}"]}}
